intents.answer:
To book a room:
1) Log in (Login on the top-right).
2) Go to the Dashboard and click a room.
3) Pick a check-in date and choose 1–5 days.
4) Click Avail to confirm. The room turns Booked and only you can Cancel it.

Login/Signup:
• Use the Login or Sign up buttons on the toolbar.

Cancel a booking:
• Open the room you booked, then click Cancel booking in the modal.
• Only the person who booked the room can see and use Cancel.
Only the original booker can cancel a room. This is enforced by Row Level Security (RLS) in the database and by the UI.
You can select 1–5 days per booking in the modal. Longer stays are not allowed in the current UI.
Available rooms are marked with the Available badge on the Dashboard grid (green). Booked rooms are labeled Booked.
